languages.text: Every time the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the sanguine siphon effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the psyker, they gain +2 stacks instead. When the psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of sanguine siphon are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or the damage is no longer lethal.
languages.original_text: Каждый раз при нанесении {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} псайкер получает +1 уровень эффекта "кровоотвод". Если урон нанесен цели на соседней клетке, псайкер получает +2 уровня эффекта. При получении смертельного урона уровни "кровоотвода" снимаются, уменьшая полученный урон на 1 за каждый уровень, пока не закончатся все уровни или пока урон не перестанет быть смертельным.

traits.locale_text: Every time the Psyker deals damage, they gain one stack of the Blood Feast effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the Psyker, they gain 2 stacks instead. When the Psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of Blood Feast are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or damage is no longer lethal.

Every time the psyker deals damage, they gain +1 stack of the blood feast effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the psyker, they gain +2 stacks instead. When the psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of blood feast are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or the damage is no longer lethal.

Every time the psyker deals damage, they gain +1 stack of the blood feast effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the psyker, they gain +2 stacks instead. When the psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of blood feast are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or the damage is no longer lethal.

Every time the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the sanguine siphon effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the psyker, they gain +2 stacks instead. When the psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of sanguine siphon are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or the damage is no longer lethal.

languages.text: 每当灵能者造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会获得1层“血腥虹吸”效果。如果目标与灵能者相邻，则会获得2层“血腥虹吸”效果。当灵能者受到致命伤害时，移除相应“血腥虹吸”层数。每移除1层，灵能者承受的伤害就降低1点，直到所有层数都被移除，或直到承受的伤害不再致命。
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the sanguine siphon effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the psyker, they gain +2 stacks instead. When the psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of sanguine siphon are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or the damage is no longer lethal.

traits.locale_text: 每当灵能者造成伤害时，都会获得1层“鲜血盛宴”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。如果目标与灵能者相邻，则会获得2层“鲜血盛宴”效果。当灵能者受到致命伤害时，移除相应“鲜血盛宴”层数。每移除1层，灵能者承受的伤害就降低1点，直到所有层数都被移除，或直到承受的伤害不再致命。

languages.text: Cada vez que el psíquico inflige daño, gana +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}efecto{/g} absorción sanguínea. Si ese daño se inflige a un objetivo adyacente al psíquico, en lugar de eso gana +2 acumulaciones. Cuando el psíquico sufre daño letal, las acumulaciones de absorción sanguínea se eliminan para reducir ese daño en −1 por cada acumulación, hasta que se eliminen todas las acumulaciones o el daño deje de ser letal.
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the sanguine siphon effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the psyker, they gain +2 stacks instead. When the psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of sanguine siphon are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or the damage is no longer lethal.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el psíquico inflige daño, gana +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}efecto{/g} absorción sanguínea. Si ese daño se inflige a un objetivo adyacente al psíquico, en lugar de eso gana +2 acumulaciones. Cuando el psíquico sufre daño letal, las acumulaciones de absorción sanguínea se eliminan para reducir ese daño en −1 por cada acumulación, hasta que se eliminen todas las acumulaciones o el daño deje de ser letal.

languages.text: 異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるたび、血の宴効果のスタックが+1追加される。異能者に隣接したターゲットがダメージを受けた場合、異能者に+2スタック加算される。異能者が致死量のダメージを受けたとき、血の宴のスタックが解放される。すべてのスタックを消費する、または致死量分のダメージを相殺するまで、そのダメージは1スタックにつき−1減少する。
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the sanguine siphon effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the psyker, they gain +2 stacks instead. When the psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of sanguine siphon are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or the damage is no longer lethal.

traits.locale_text: 異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるたび、血の宴効果のスタックが+1追加される。異能者に隣接したターゲットがダメージを受けた場合、異能者に+2スタック加算される。異能者が致死量のダメージを受けたとき、血の宴のスタックが解放される。すべてのスタックを消費する、または致死量分のダメージを相殺するまで、そのダメージは1スタックにつき−1減少する。

languages.text: Каждый раз при нанесении {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} псайкер получает +1 уровень эффекта "кровоотвод". Если урон нанесен цели на соседней клетке, псайкер получает +2 уровня эффекта. При получении смертельного урона уровни "кровоотвода" снимаются, уменьшая полученный урон на 1 за каждый уровень, пока не закончатся все уровни или пока урон не перестанет быть смертельным.
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the sanguine siphon effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the psyker, they gain +2 stacks instead. When the psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of sanguine siphon are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or the damage is no longer lethal.

traits.locale_text: Каждый раз при нанесении урона псайкер получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекта{/g} "кровавый пир". Если урон нанесен цели на клетке, смежной с позицией псайкера, псайкер получает +2 уровня эффекта. При получении смертельного урона уровни "кровавого пира" снимаются, уменьшая полученный урон на 1 за каждый уровень, пока не закончатся все уровни или пока урон не перестанет быть смертельным.

Каждый раз при нанесении урона псайкер получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекта{/g} "кровавый пир". Если урон нанесен цели на клетке, смежной с позицией псайкера, псайкер получает +2 уровня эффекта. При получении смертельного урона уровни "кровавого пира" снимаются, уменьшая полученный урон на 1 за каждый уровень, пока не закончатся все уровни или пока урон не перестанет быть смертельным.

languages.text: Wenn der Psioniker {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursacht, erhält er +1 Stapel des Effektes "Blutroter Sog". Erleidet ein Ziel neben dem Psioniker diesen Schaden, erhält er stattdessen +2 Stapel. Wenn der Psioniker tödlichen Schaden erleidet, werden die Stapel von "Blutroter Sog" entfernt, um diesen Schaden um −1 pro Stapel zu reduzieren, bis entweder alle Stapel entfernt sind oder der Schaden nicht mehr tödlich ist.
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the sanguine siphon effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the psyker, they gain +2 stacks instead. When the psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of sanguine siphon are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or the damage is no longer lethal.

traits.locale_text: Jedes Mal, wenn der Psioniker {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt, erhält er +1 Stapel des Effekts Blutroter Sog. Sollte dieser Schaden einem Ziel zugefügt worden sein, das sich neben dem Psioniker befindet, erhält er stattdessen +2 Stapel. Wenn der Psioniker tödlichen Schaden erleidet, werden die Stapel von Blutroter Sog entfernt, um diesen Schaden um −1 pro Stapel zu reduzieren, bis entweder alle Stapel entfernt sind oder der Schaden nicht mehr tödlich ist.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le psyker inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, il obtient +1 cumul de l'effet Siphon sanglant. Si ces dégâts ont été infligés à une cible adjacente au psyker, il obtient +2 cumuls. Lorsque le psyker subit des dégâts mortels, les cumuls de l'effet Siphon sanglant sont supprimés pour réduire ces dégâts de −1 par cumul, jusqu'à ce que tous les cumuls soient supprimés ou que les dégâts ne soient plus mortels.
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the sanguine siphon effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the psyker, they gain +2 stacks instead. When the psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of sanguine siphon are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or the damage is no longer lethal.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le psyker inflige des dégâts, il obtient +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Festin Sanglant. Si ces dégâts ont été infligés à une cible adjacente au psyker, il obtient +2 cumuls. Lorsque le psyker subit des dégâts mortels, les cumuls de l'effet Festin Sanglant sont supprimés pour réduire ces dégâts de -1 par cumul, jusqu'à ce que tous les cumuls soient supprimés ou que les dégâts ne soient plus mortels.

languages.text: Ruhsezer, her {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde +1 soğuran kan birikimi elde eder. Bu hasarı bitişiğindeki bir hedefe verdiğinde ise +2 birikim kazanır. Ruhsezer, ölümcül hasara maruz kaldığında bu hasarı bertaraf etmek için soğuran kan birikimleri kullanılır. Hasar, ölümcül olmaktan çıkana veya tüm birikim tükenene dek her birikim için 1 puan azaltılır.
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the sanguine siphon effect. If that damage was dealt to a target adjacent to the psyker, they gain +2 stacks instead. When the psyker suffers lethal damage, the stacks of sanguine siphon are removed to reduce this damage by −1 for each stack, until either all stacks are removed or the damage is no longer lethal.
